short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage and save open tabs in Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab Wizard is a powerful Chrome extension designed to streamline your web browsing experience. With an intuitive interface, you can easily input your links directly into a text box (one per line) or upload a CSV file containing a "Website Name" column for batch link processing. Customize your browsing by adjusting the number of tabs to open at once in the preferences section. Plus, enjoy a seamless dark mode for a more comfortable experience during nighttime browsing. Whether you're managing a list of websites or just want a more organized tab workflow, Tab Wizard is the perfect tool for you.
